title: I Spy Santa Claus
description: A Level 1 reader, based upon the bestselling I Spy series, with picture riddles and search-and-find fun!All new, easy-to read riddles by Jean Marzollo are paired with fun photographs culled from previously published I Spy books to create a festive I Spy easy reader. With rhythm, rhyme, and picture clues, this book is written to support the newest reader!
author: Jean Marzollo
